content: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Light moves (Job 38:19,20). SCIENCE THEN Light was fixed in place. SCIENCE NOW Light moves. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Air has weight (Job 28:25). SCIENCE THEN Air was weightless. SCIENCE NOW Air has weight. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Winds blow in cyclones (Ecclesiastes 1:6). SCIENCE THEN Winds blew straight. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. SCIENCE NOW Blood is the source of life and health. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains (2 Samuel 22:16; Jonah 2:6). SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water (Leviticus 15:13). SCIENCE THEN Hands washed in still water. SCIENCE NOW When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water.

content: This is a load of old bollocks, not least because what we think of as science didn't exist until the latter half of the second millenium. However some of the god-botherers claims are also bollocks by the closest thing to science there was at the time be it philosophy of mathemetics. I'll pick out just a few [my green]: quote: Originally posted by soscorpio: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. Bollocks, philosophers deduced that the world was round in pre Christian times. Aristotle writes in 298BC that mathematicians were estimating the circumference of the Earth and of course Eratosthenes estimeated the circumference within 1% circa 240BC (a Muslim got it down to about 0.1% error in the C8th). SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. Bollocks, this was a myth no credible philosopher had argued this since archaeic Greece. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. Bollocks, philosophers had been suggesting various elemental systems from the simple earth, air, fire, water and aether (adding and subtracting various others) to a concept of dozens of separate indivisible units. In fact the word "atom" was coined in the C5th BC by IIRC Democritus. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. SCIENCE NOW Blood is the source of life and health. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains (2 Samuel 22:16; Jonah 2:6). SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water (Leviticus 15:13). SCIENCE THEN Hands washed in still water. SCIENCE NOW When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water.

(growing a longer beak is not the same as man evolving from mud dwellers - ok, so save it) There's a mountain of evidence, especially at the genetic level. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. I'll pick out just a few [my green]: quote: Originally posted by soscorpio: quote: Ahhhhh Science. Bollocks, philosophers deduced that the world was round in pre Christian times. Aristotle writes in 298BC that mathematicians were estimating the circumference of the Earth and of course Eratosthenes estimeated the circumference within 1% circa 240BC (a Muslim got it down to about 0.1% error in the C8th). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. Bollocks, philosophers had been suggesting various elemental systems from the simple earth, air, fire, water and aether (adding and subtracting various others) to a concept of dozens of separate indivisible units. content: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Light moves (Job 38:19,20). SCIENCE THEN Light was fixed in place. SCIENCE NOW Light moves. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Air has weight (Job 28:25). SCIENCE THEN Air was weightless. SCIENCE NOW Air has weight. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Winds blow in cyclones (Ecclesiastes 1:6). SCIENCE THEN Winds blew straight. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. SCIENCE NOW Blood is the source of life and health. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains (2 Samuel 22:16; Jonah 2:6). SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water (Leviticus 15:13). SCIENCE THEN Hands washed in still water. SCIENCE NOW When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water.

content: This is a load of old bollocks, not least because what we think of as science didn't exist until the latter half of the second millenium. However some of the god-botherers claims are also bollocks by the closest thing to science there was at the time be it philosophy of mathemetics. I'll pick out just a few [my green]: quote: Originally posted by soscorpio: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. Bollocks, philosophers deduced that the world was round in pre Christian times. Aristotle writes in 298BC that mathematicians were estimating the circumference of the Earth and of course Eratosthenes estimeated the circumference within 1% circa 240BC (a Muslim got it down to about 0.1% error in the C8th). SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. Bollocks, this was a myth no credible philosopher had argued this since archaeic Greece. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. Bollocks, philosophers had been suggesting various elemental systems from the simple earth, air, fire, water and aether (adding and subtracting various others) to a concept of dozens of separate indivisible units. In fact the word "atom" was coined in the C5th BC by IIRC Democritus. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. SCIENCE NOW Blood is the source of life and health. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains (2 Samuel 22:16; Jonah 2:6). SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water (Leviticus 15:13). SCIENCE THEN Hands washed in still water. SCIENCE NOW When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water.

content: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Light moves (Job 38:19,20). SCIENCE THEN Light was fixed in place. SCIENCE NOW Light moves. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Air has weight (Job 28:25). SCIENCE THEN Air was weightless. SCIENCE NOW Air has weight. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Winds blow in cyclones (Ecclesiastes 1:6). SCIENCE THEN Winds blew straight. SCIENCE NOW Winds blow in cyclones. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Blood is the source of life and health (Leviticus 17:11). SCIENCE THEN Sick people must be bled. SCIENCE NOW Blood is the source of life and health. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains (2 Samuel 22:16; Jonah 2:6). SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water (Leviticus 15:13). SCIENCE THEN Hands washed in still water. SCIENCE NOW When dealing with disease, hands should be washed under running water.

content: This is a load of old bollocks, not least because what we think of as science didn't exist until the latter half of the second millenium. However some of the god-botherers claims are also bollocks by the closest thing to science there was at the time be it philosophy of mathemetics. I'll pick out just a few [my green]: quote: Originally posted by soscorpio: quote: Ahhhhh Science. It continues to soar, solving the mysteries of the universe, curing diseases, and building bridges while it's lowly cousin Creationism is still trying to master the wheel and axle. The scientist's nightmare that after years spent climbing the mountains in search of the truth, when they finally reach the peak, they spot the theologians already on top basking in the sun. Science Confirms the Bible THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) The earth is a sphere (Isaiah 40:22). SCIENCE THEN The earth was a flat disk. Bollocks, philosophers deduced that the world was round in pre Christian times. Aristotle writes in 298BC that mathematicians were estimating the circumference of the Earth and of course Eratosthenes estimeated the circumference within 1% circa 240BC (a Muslim got it down to about 0.1% error in the C8th). SCIENCE NOW The earth is a sphere. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Innumerable stars (Jeremiah 33:22). SCIENCE THEN Only 1,100 stars. SCIENCE NOW Innumerable stars. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Free float of earth in space (Job 26:7). SCIENCE THEN Earth sat on a large animal. Bollocks, this was a myth no credible philosopher had argued this since archaeic Greece. SCIENCE NOW Free float of earth in space. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Creation made of invisible elements (Hebrews11:3). SCIENCE THEN Science was ignorant on the subject. Bollocks, philosophers had been suggesting various elemental systems from the simple earth, air, fire, water and aether (adding and subtracting various others) to a concept of dozens of separate indivisible units. In fact the word "atom" was coined in the C5th BC by IIRC Democritus. SCIENCE NOW Creation made of invisible elements (atoms). THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Each star is different (1 Corinthians 15:41). SCIENCE THEN All stars were the same. SCIENCE NOW Each star is different. SCIENCE THEN The ocean floor was flat. SCIENCE NOW Ocean floor contains deep valleys and mountains. THE BIBLE (2,000–3,000 years ago) Ocean contains springs (Job 38:16). SCIENCE THEN Ocean fed only by rivers and rain. SCIENCE NOW Ocean contains springs.
